019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import java.io.File;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStream;
024import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
025import java.net.URI;
026import java.net.URISyntaxException;
027import java.nio.file.Files;
028import java.util.Arrays;
029import java.util.Collections;
030import java.util.logging.Level;
031import java.util.logging.LogManager;
032import java.util.logging.Logger;
033import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
034import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser;
035import org.apache.commons.cli.DefaultParser;
036import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
037import org.apache.commons.cli.Options;
038import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_NAME;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.FsdUtils;
040import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
041import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
043import org.jgrapes.core.NamedChannel;
044import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
045import org.jgrapes.core.events.HandlingError;
046import org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop;
047import org.jgrapes.http.HttpServer;
048import org.jgrapes.http.InMemorySessionManager;
049import org.jgrapes.http.LanguageSelector;
050import org.jgrapes.http.events.Request;
051import org.jgrapes.io.NioDispatcher;
052import org.jgrapes.io.util.PermitsPool;
053import org.jgrapes.net.SocketServer;
054import org.jgrapes.util.ComponentCollector;
055import org.jgrapes.util.FileSystemWatcher;
056import org.jgrapes.util.YamlConfigurationStore;
057import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
058import org.jgrapes.webconlet.locallogin.LoginConlet;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.BrowserLocalBackedKVStore;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletComponentFactory;
061import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleWeblet;
062import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy;
063import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.PageResourceProviderFactory;
064import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsole;
065import org.jgrapes.webconsole.rbac.RoleConfigurator;
066import org.jgrapes.webconsole.rbac.RoleConletFilter;
067import org.jgrapes.webconsole.vuejs.VueJsConsoleWeblet;
068
069/**
070 * The application class. In framework term, this is the root component.
071 * Two of its child components, the {@link Controller} and the WebGui
072 * implement user-visible functions. The others are used internally.
073 * 
074 * ![Manager components](manager-components.svg)
075 * 
076 * @startuml manager-components.svg
077 * skinparam component {
078 *   BackGroundColor #FEFECE
079 *   BorderColor #A80036
080 *   BorderThickness 1.25
081 *   BackgroundColor<<internal>> #F1F1F1
082 *   BorderColor<<internal>> #181818
083 *   BorderThickness<<internal>> 1
084 * }
085 * 
086 * [Manager]
087 * [Manager] *--> [Controller]
088 * [Manager] *--> [WebGui]
089 * [NioDispatcher] <<internal>>
090 * [Manager] *--> [NioDispatcher] <<internal>>
091 * [FileSystemWatcher] <<internal>>
092 * [Manager] *--> [FileSystemWatcher] <<internal>>
093 * @enduml
094 */
095public class Manager extends Component {
096
097    private static Manager app;
098
099    /**
100     * Instantiates a new manager.
101     * @param cmdLine 
102     *
103     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
104     */
105    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.TooFewBranchesForASwitchStatement")
106    public Manager(CommandLine cmdLine) throws IOException {
107        // Prepare component tree
108        attach(new NioDispatcher());
109        attach(new FileSystemWatcher(channel()));
110        attach(new Controller(channel()));
111
112        // Configuration store with file in /etc/opt (default)
113        File cfgFile = new File(cmdLine.getOptionValue('c',
114            "/etc/opt/" + VM_OP_NAME.replace("-", "") + "/config.yaml"))
115                .getCanonicalFile();
116        logger.config(() -> "Using configuration from: " + cfgFile.getPath());
117        // Don't rely on night config to produce a good exception
118        // for this simple case
119        if (!Files.isReadable(cfgFile.toPath())) {
120            throw new IOException("Cannot read configuration file " + cfgFile);
121        }
122        attach(new YamlConfigurationStore(channel(), cfgFile, false));
123        fire(new WatchFile(cfgFile.toPath()));
124
125        // Prepare GUI
126        Channel httpTransport = new NamedChannel("httpTransport");
127        attach(new SocketServer(httpTransport)
128            .setConnectionLimiter(new PermitsPool(300))
129            .setMinimalPurgeableTime(1000)
130            .setServerAddress(new InetSocketAddress(8080))
131            .setName("HttpSocketServer"));
132
133        // Create an HTTP server as converter between transport and application
134        // layer.
135        Channel httpChannel = new NamedChannel("HTTP");
136        HttpServer httpServer = attach(new HttpServer(httpChannel,
137            httpTransport, Request.In.Get.class, Request.In.Post.class));
138
139        // Build HTTP application layer
140        httpServer.attach(new InMemorySessionManager(httpChannel));
141        httpServer.attach(new LanguageSelector(httpChannel));
142        URI rootUri;
143        try {
144            rootUri = new URI("/");
145        } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
146            // Cannot happen
147            return;
148        }
149        ConsoleWeblet consoleWeblet = httpServer
150            .attach(new VueJsConsoleWeblet(httpChannel, Channel.SELF, rootUri))
151            .prependClassTemplateLoader(getClass())
152            .prependResourceBundleProvider(getClass())
153            .prependConsoleResourceProvider(getClass());
154        consoleWeblet.setName("ConsoleWeblet");
155        WebConsole console = consoleWeblet.console();
156        console.attach(new BrowserLocalBackedKVStore(
157            console.channel(), consoleWeblet.prefix().getPath()));
158        console.attach(new KVStoreBasedConsolePolicy(console.channel()));
159        console.attach(new RoleConfigurator(console.channel()));
160        console.attach(new RoleConletFilter(console.channel()));
161        console.attach(new LoginConlet(console.channel()));
162        // Add all available page resource providers
163        console.attach(new ComponentCollector<>(
164            PageResourceProviderFactory.class, console.channel()));
165        // Add all available conlets
166        console.attach(new ComponentCollector<>(
167            ConletComponentFactory.class, console.channel(), type -> {
168                if (LoginConlet.class.getName().equals(type)) {
169                    // Explicitly added, see above
170                    return Collections.emptyList();
171                } else {
172                    return Arrays.asList(Collections.emptyMap());
173                }
174            }));
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Log the exception when a handling error is reported.
179     *
180     * @param event the event
181     */
182    @Handler(channels = Channel.class, priority = -10_000)
183    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.GuardLogStatement")
184    public void onHandlingError(HandlingError event) {
185        logger.log(Level.WARNING, event.throwable(),
186            () -> "Problem invoking handler with " + event.event() + ": "
187                + event.message());
188        event.stop();
189    }
190
191    /**
192     * On stop.
193     *
194     * @param event the event
195     */
196    @Handler(priority = -1000)
197    public void onStop(Stop event) {
198        logger.fine(() -> "Application stopped.");
199    }
200
201    static {
202        try {
203            // Get logging properties from file and put them in effect
204            InputStream props;
205            var path = FsdUtils.findConfigFile(VM_OP_NAME.replace("-", ""),
206                "logging.properties");
207            if (path.isPresent()) {
208                props = Files.newInputStream(path.get());
209            } else {
210                props
211                    = Manager.class.getResourceAsStream("logging.properties");
212            }
213            LogManager.getLogManager().readConfiguration(props);
214        } catch (IOException e) {
215            e.printStackTrace(); // NOPMD
216        }
217    }
218
219    /**
220     * The main method.
221     *
222     * @param args the arguments
223     * @throws Exception the exception
224     */
225    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.SignatureDeclareThrowsException")
226    public static void main(String[] args) {
227        try {
228            // Instance logger is not available yet.
229            var logger = Logger.getLogger(Manager.class.getName());
230            logger.config(() -> "Version: "
231                + Manager.class.getPackage().getImplementationVersion());
232            logger.config(() -> "running on "
233                + System.getProperty("java.vm.name")
234                + " (" + System.getProperty("java.vm.version") + ")"
235                + " from " + System.getProperty("java.vm.vendor"));
236
237            // Parse the command line arguments
238            CommandLineParser parser = new DefaultParser();
239            final Options options = new Options();
240            options.addOption(new Option("c", "config", true, "The configura"
241                + "tion file (defaults to /etc/opt/vmoperator/config.yaml)."));
242            CommandLine cmd = parser.parse(options, args);
243
244            // The Manager is the root component
245            app = new Manager(cmd);
246
247            // Prepare generation of Stop event
248            Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(() -> {
249                try {
250                    app.fire(new Stop());
251                    Components.awaitExhaustion();
252                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
253                    // Cannot do anything about this.
254                }
255            }));
256
257            // Start the application
258            Components.start(app);
259        } catch (IOException | InterruptedException
260                | org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException e) {
261            Logger.getLogger(Manager.class.getName()).log(Level.SEVERE, e,
262                () -> "Failed to start manager: " + e.getMessage());
263        }
264    }
265
266}
